# Tutorial Guide Template

## Document Header
```yaml
title: "[Tutorial Title]"
difficulty: "[Beginner/Intermediate/Advanced]"
duration: "[Estimated time]"
prerequisites: "[Required knowledge/setup]"
last_updated: "[Date]"
```

## Introduction
- What you'll learn
- Why this matters
- Expected outcomes

## Prerequisites
- Required knowledge
- Tools/setup

- [ ] Objective 1
- [ ] Objective 2

## Steps

### Step 1: [Action]
- Goal, instructions, verification, troubleshooting

### Step 2: [Action]
- Repeat structure
